issue.title: Update bazel version to Bazel 8.0.0rc7
issue.body:
The workaround in WORKSPACE.bzlmod is needed for the hybrid bzlmod+workspace mode, since rules_scala depends on rules_java. Repos declared by rules_java (with bzlmod) are not automatically visible to WORKSPACE repositories.

# Checklist

- [ ] I have filed an issue about this change and discussed potential changes with the maintainers.
- [ ] I have received the approval from the maintainers to make this change.
- [ ] This is not a stylistic, refactoring, or cleanup change.

Please note that the maintainers will not be reviewing this change until all checkboxes are ticked. See 
the [Contributions](https://github.com/bazelbuild/intellij#contributions) section in the README for more 
details.

# Discussion thread for this change

Issue number: https://github.com/bazelbuild/intellij/issues/7058

# Description of this change

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

body:
A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 8.0.0 RC8](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/8.0.0rc8). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting USE_BAZEL_VERSION=8.0.0rc8. Thanks!
